content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 20 Nov 2018Online brokerages that levy a fee on dividend payouts?What do you think on online brokerages that levy a fee on dividend payouts? seems like an outright cash grab, considering brokerages already charging transaction & custody fees etc. Any factors/blind spots that you would consider when choosing a online brokerage?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 23 Dec 2018If custody is under CDP then usually there is no dividend charges.However, if you open a custodian account, there might be dividend charges because the bank or brokerage has to process the admin and company actions.0 comments0
